name: Mush Rush (Miguel Luz)
description:
A little game I made for a Game Design class! Try to survive for as long as you can while you avoid the enemies.

Art and Code by Miguel Luz
Music by Monplaisirmusic
Sound Effects by Time Wobblers

CONTROLS:
-Tap the screen on mobile, or use a mouse on desktop to jump.
-Tap midair to double jump and shoot a projectile.
